name: Baby Kids In Yellow House 2
description:
Welcome to this brand new chapter 2 with a completely new awesome story, features, and new surprises for your complete excitement.

Chapter 2 contains 2 nights’ stories: During the first night, you will have to manage a horrific baby boy. Exciting surprises are waiting for you! 

During the second night, you will have to manage two babies: the baby boy and his terrific sister. 

Can you solve all the mysteries and make it to the last night? Download now and discover this brand-new chapter. Enjoy!

NOTE: chapter 1 is released only on App Store & Play Store
